dcterms:creator: B. Landman
Z. Xu
J. Igelsias
M. Styner
T. Langerak
A. Klein
dcterms:description: The MICCAI 2015 BTCV dataset consists of 100 de-identified 3D contrast-enhanced CT scans with 7968 axial slices in total, containing annotations for 12 organs including spleen, kidneys, gallbladder, esophagus, liver, stomach, aorta, inferior vena cava, portal splenic vein, pancreas, and right adrenal gland.
dcterms:title: MICCAI 2015 Challenge Beyond The Cranial Vault (BTCV) dataset

dcterms:description: The non-contrast clinical cohort consists of 56 3D CT scans with expert refined annotations for the same 12 organs as the MICCAI 2015 BTCV challenge datasets.
dcterms:title: Non-contrast clinical cohort

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C. K. J. Winn
I. Williams
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset consists of 10582 training images, 1449 validation images, and 456 testing images with pixel-level annotations of 20 classes and one background.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset
